content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5) which is not connected to the power network.

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of a boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0) with a fuel inventory containing coal, connected to pipes at positions (x=-0.5, y=1.5) and (x=3.5, y=1.5).

### Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0)
Consists of a boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0) with no fuel, connected to pipes at positions (x=-0.5, y=3.5) and (x=3.5, y=3.5).

### Boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0) with no fuel, connected to pipes at positions (x=-26.5, y=32.5) and (x=-22.5, y=32.5).

### Offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5) connected to pipes at position(x=-7.5, y=24.5).

### Offshore pump at position(x=-18.5, y=27.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=-18.5, y=27.5) connected to pipes at position(x=-19.5, y=27.5).

### Offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5) connected to pipes at position(x=-16.5, y=25.5).

### Offshore pump at position(x=-13.5, y=26.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=-13.5, y=26.5) connected to pipes at position(x=-13.5, y=25.5).

### Offshore pump at position(x=-3.5, y=27.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=-3.5, y=27.5) connected to pipes at position(x=-3.5, y=26.5).

### Offshore pump at position(x=-1.5, y=28.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=-1.5, y=28.5) connected to pipes at position(x=-1.5, y=27.5).

### Offshore pump at position(x=0.5, y=30.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=0.5, y=30.5) connected to pipes at position(x=1.5, y=30.5).

### Offshore pump at position(x=1.5, y=32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=1.5, y=32.5) connected to pipes at position(x=2.5, y=32.5).

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when boiler is not working
- Ensure that the boiler has sufficient fuel to operate.
- Check that the boiler is properly connected to the power network and fluid systems.

### Errors when inserting coal into boiler
- Make sure that the boiler is not already full before inserting coal.
- Ensure that the agent has sufficient coal in its inventory to insert into the boiler.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pump is properly connected to pipes and fluid systems.
- Check that the offshore pump has sufficient water to operate.

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that the steam engine is properly connected to the power network and fluid systems.
- Check that the steam engine has sufficient input liquid to operate.
